course_description: Introduction to the concepts, assumptions, principles, and procedures underlying financial accounting, with an emphasis on understanding how a company's operating, investing, and financing activities are reported on its financial statements.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: 1748, Section #: 3201, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: U. Rackliffe, Status: Open
